IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MAINTAINS MUSEUM COLLECTIONS, PRESENTS EXHIBITIONS OF FOLK AND DECORATIVE ARTS, AND ENHANCES PUBLIC AWARENESS THROUGH EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS.
IRS990.Desc: MAINTAINS MUSEUM COLLECTIONS, PRESENTS EXHIBITIONS OF FOLK AND DECORATIVE ARTS, AND ENHANCES PUBLIC AWARENESS THROUGH EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MUSEUM'S COLLECTIONS ARE MADE UP OF ARTIFACTS OF HISTORICAL SIGNIFICANCE AND ART OBJECTS THAT ARE HELD FOR EDUCATIONAL AND CURATORIAL PURPOSES. ALL ITEMS ARE CONTINUOUSLY PRESERVED AND CARED FOR.

THE ENDOWMENT ASSETS ATTEMPT TO PROVIDE A PREDICTABLE STREAM OF FUNDING TO PROGRAMS SUPPORTED BY ITS ENDOWMENT FUNDS WHILE ALSO MAINTAINING THE PURCHASING POWER OF THOSE ENDOWMENT ASSETS OVER THE LONG-TERM. A SPENDING POLICY IS DETERMINED ANNUALLY BY THE INVESTMENT COMMITTEE.
THERE WERE NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IDENTIFIED OR LIABILITIES RECORDED FOR THE FISCAL YEAR ENDED FEBRUARY 28, 2018.
HISTORICAL AND MUSEUM OBJECTS DONATED TO THE ORGANIZATIONS ARE NOT REFLECTED IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. ANY COLLECTIONS ACQUIRED BY PURCHASE ARE EXPENSED IN THE YEAR PURCHASED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION WILL MAKE A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 AVAILABLE TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS WHO WOULD LIKE TO REVIEW THE 990 PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SELF ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SALARY COMPENSATION FOR EMPLOYEES OF KEMERER MUSEUM OF DECORATIVE ARTS IS PAID THROUGH HISTORIC BETHLEHEM PARTNERSHIP, INC. (AN AFFILIATED PARTY) EIN 23-2741808. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE COMPARED THE SALARIES OF ALL OF THE ORGANIZATIONS EMPLOYEES WITH A 2014 SALARY COMPARISON FROM AMERICAN ALLIANCE OF MUSEUMS. SALARIES ARE BASED MAINLY ON THE BUDGET OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WERE AUDITED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT ON A CONSOLIDATED BASIS WITH ITS AFFILIATED ORGANIZATIONS. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE ORGANIZATIONS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS WELL AS THE SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT CHANGED THIS PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO MANAGE, PRESERVE, AND RESTORE HISTORIC SITES IN THE BETHLEHEM AREA.
CONDUCT EDUCATION TOURS AND PRESERVE COLLECTION OF HISTORICAL BUILDINGS
COLLECT, RESTORE, PRESERVE, AND INTERPRET HISTORIC BUILDINGS
RESTORATION, RECONSTRUCTION, MAINENANCE & INTERPRETATION OF A HISTORIC FARM
